nodes.docs:
Requests to connect to a wallet.

- Docs: https://viem.sh/experimental/erc7846/connect
- JSON-RPC Methods: [`wallet_connect`](https://github.com/ethereum/ERCs/blob/abd1c9f4eda2d6ad06ade0e3af314637a27d1ee7/ERCS/erc-7846.md)
tags: List of accounts managed by a wallet {@link ConnectReturnType}

nodes.docs: The [EIP-155](https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-155) Chain ID to which the session is bound,
A random string typically chosen by the relying party and used to prevent replay attacks.

flagNotations.name: log
flagNotations.value: message: 'example.com wants you to sign in with your Ethereum account...',
